name: Mage Rage
description:
Players will control a mighty fire magician and fight against unholy enemies and their allies. The main point of the game is reaching to the highest score. For that, players need to kill as many enemies as possible and survive as long as possible.

CURRENT FEATURE

- 14 different spells and unlocking system
- 5 different enemy types
- 5 different rare enemy types
- Mana, Cooldown and Rage management for balancing
- Difficulty scale according to the level of the player

UPCOMING FEATURE

- Character customisation: Players will be able to upgrade the skills they like the most
- Skill runes: Players will be able to modify the skills
- More playable characters
- Co-op gameplay
- Lore and Story Mode
